Well I know that there was a big complaint sounded to "fix the drum"
animation when EQ first started. Looks like they finally are getting around
to it, but we still don't have a drum picture. Doesn't really matter to me
as long as I'm still running as fast as I was. It'll just take a little
getting used to.

As for new graphics for armor, I doubt they'll provide different looking
armor types except in the expansion. Verant's put in a lot of effort to
minimize the different "looks" of armor out there and basically take the
armor that is already in the game, and "colorize" it to represent different
types. The banded armor for Half Elf is also used for "blackened" armor. The
"bronze" armor is used for Mithril/Lambent/Plate (probably barnacle) and I
believe Imbrued.

---Windleaf
